Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Focus on finalizing all compliance documents for internal approval.
Complete the fund's code of ethics and AML policies. Ensure all team members are aware of their obligations under these policies.
Meet with @audit-1 to discuss the external audit process and ensure all compliance documents are audit-ready.
Final review of Form N-1A and Form ADV with @legal-1 and @comp-1. Address any last-minute changes or clarifications.
Prepare a submission package for the SEC, including all required forms and supporting documents. Double-check filing instructions and fees.
Coordinate with @pm-1 to schedule a dry-run of the SEC submission process, ensuring all technical requirements (e.g., EDGAR filing) are met.
Draft a communication plan for investors (@ir-1) regarding the fund's registration status and expected timeline for approval.
Update the compliance timeline and send a final pre-submission report to @coo-1 and @cio-1 for review.
